notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: E.H. and Y.H. conceived, designed, and coordinated the study. E.H. fabricated LCO. K.H., E.H., Y.H., D.A., N.N. and K.A. designed five terminal holder and established transfer system without air exposure. H.K. fabricated the dry polymer. E.H., H.K. and T.S. prepared the operando cell. K.A., N.N., D.A., E.H., Y.H. and M.O. conducted the experiment and analyzed the data by 3DnanoESCA under the operando condition. All authors discussed the results and commented on the manuscript.
